name: X
advices: It takes about 300 ingame hours to complete the 100% challenge.
The hardest task is obtaining the Starf Berry which requires 200 consecutive Battle Mansion wins.
Another hard task is obtaining the Master Rank in the Battle Institute.
The most time consuming task is obtaining all Pokémon-Amie Decoration and upgrading O-Powers.

categories.name: Pokémon Form
categories.missable: Your 3DS region must not be France or Catalonia (Spain) because the other regions have access to two Vivillon patterns instead of one: their region's one and the Meadow Pattern Vivillon from battling Leader Viola in the Santalune City Gym.

list.name: Kalos Champion Ribbon
list.location: Beating the Kalos Champion and entering the Kalos Hall of Fame.

list.name: Expert Battler Ribbon
list.location: Defeat a Battle in a Super Battle.

list.name: Effort Ribbon
list.location: Given to a Pokémon with 510 effort values. Laverre City Pokémon Fan Club

list.name: Alert Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Mondays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Ambrette

list.name: Shock Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Tuesdays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Camphrier

list.name: Downcast Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Wednesdays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Marine Snow

list.name: Careless Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Thursdays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Coumarine

list.name: Relax Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Fridays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Couriway

list.name: Snooze Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Saturdays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Cyllage

list.name: Smile Ribbon
list.location: Always given out on Sundays, to the first Pokémon in the party. Tourist in Hotel Coumarine

list.name: Footprint Ribbon
list.location: Given to a Pokémon whose current level is 30 higher than the level it was caught or received at. Shalour City

list.name: Best Friends Ribbon
list.location: Given to a Pokémon with maximum Affection. Prism Tower

list.name: Training Ribbon
list.location: Given to a Supremely Trained Pokémon. North Boulevard

list.location: Get a record in the Hall of Fame
